dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, hey, did you catch the news about President Xi Jinping's arrival in Kazakhstan? Uh, there's some pretty wild footage out there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, hey, did you catch the news about President Xi Jinping's arrival in Kazakhstan? Uh, there's some pretty wild footage out there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah! I saw something pop up. Was it about, like, fighter jets?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah! I saw something pop up. Was it about, like, fighter jets?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! The Akorda press service confirmed it, actually. His plane, um, was escorted by fighter jets all the way to Astana Airport.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! The Akorda press service confirmed it, actually. His plane, um, was escorted by fighter jets all the way to Astana Airport.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Footage has emerged showing fighter jets escorting Chinese President Xi Jinping's plane to Astana Airport, citing the Akorda press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, really? From when it entered their airspace? That's, like, quite the welcome, or security detail, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, really? From when it entered their airspace? That's, like, quite the welcome, or security detail, I guess.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly. From the moment it crossed into Kazakh airspace until it landed. Pretty intense, um, show of... well, whatever you want to call it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly. From the moment it crossed into Kazakh airspace until it landed. Pretty intense, um, show of... well, whatever you want to call it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Akorda, from the moment the aircraft entered Kazakhstan's airspace until its arrival in the capital, it was accompanied by fighter jets from the country's Air Defense Forces.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, what's he doing there? Just a quick stop, or is it a longer visit?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, what's he doing there? Just a quick stop, or is it a longer visit?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's actually a two-day official visit. President Tokayev invited him, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's actually a two-day official visit. President Tokayev invited him, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Xi Jinping has arrived in Kazakhstan for a two-day official visit at the invitation of President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, [interrupts] what's on the agenda for those two days?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, what's on the agenda for those two days?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Primarily, high-level bilateral talks. They're looking to, uh, really strengthen their comprehensive strategic partnership, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Primarily, high-level bilateral talks. They're looking to, uh, really strengthen their comprehensive strategic partnership, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the visit, the two leaders are expected to hold high-level bilateral talks focused on further strengthening the comprehensive strategic partnership between Kazakhstan and China.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, right. And isn't there something else happening there too? Like, a bigger regional meeting?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, right. And isn't there something else happening there too? Like, a bigger regional meeting?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely! The second "Central Asia - China" summit is happening on June 17th, also in Astana.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely! The second Central Asia - China summit is happening on June seventeenth, also in Astana.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 17, Astana will host the second "Central Asia - China" summit, with the participation of heads of state from across the region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, so all the regional heads of state will be there. That's a pretty big deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, so all the regional heads of state will be there. That's a pretty big deal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 17, Astana will host the second "Central Asia - China" summit, with the participation of heads of state from across the region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it is. Astana's, um, apparently been buzzing with preparations for weeks for all this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it is. Astana's, um, apparently been buzzing with preparations for weeks for all this.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds like a busy few days for Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds like a busy few days for Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. A lot of eyes on Central Asia right now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. A lot of eyes on Central Asia right now.
